item.title: Server moved to Netcup
item.description:
After about 1,5 years on a hetzner dedicated server which I was heavily under-utilizing, I finally decided to move all my family related websites and emails to a Netcup KVM server. This is definitly saving me a buck or two per month and is still more than enough power to run all my services.

I also made the move from Apache to nginx which brought some difficulties with getting Nextcloud to run properly. More on that in a future blog post.
